title: The Wonderful World Series
description: Batter up! Each October baseball fans sit on the edge of their seats and anxiously await the high point of the Major League Baseball season: the World Series. This best-of-seven playoff series is rooted in a rich history filled with amazing athletic feats and baseball superstars. The Wonderful World Series is a detailed text that relates the history and highlights of this exciting tournament.
highFrequencyWords: caliber, division, feats, league, play-offs, professional, season, shutouts, triple play, underdog, wild card, World Series
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Hyphenated Compound Adjectives                : Identify hyphenated compound adjectives
awareness: Compound Words                : Discriminate closed compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
